column1: Macropus rufus;Red Kangaroo;Apart from the gray and giant kangaroo
column2: this species is one of the largest marsupials living today. These animals can jump up to 3 meters
column3: and up to 9 meters in the distance. Powerful tails of kangaroos are useful for comfortable rest
column4: serving as a third leg.Â Gestation in this species lasts 33 days
column5: the young remain in the pouch for about 7-8 months.;LC;https://www.iucnredlist.org/species/40567/21953534
